transArray.content: The manager sent fruits and snacks and helped choose breakfast. He was very enthusiastic and the room was very clean.

Hello dear guest! Thank you for your recognition of the service attitude of our friends at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your encouragement is very important. If life is a journey, we are willing to be your warmest stop. If meeting is a ballad, we are willing to be your wisp. Happy note, I want you to write down your mood in notes. Friends, I look forward to meeting you next time.
